titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that India should be a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that India should be a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that India should be a permanent member of the United Nations (UN) Security Council.
